connect20/cybage_swatches.name: connect20/Cybage_Swatches

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/cybage_swatches.description: Administrator can use the Color Swatch plug-in for configurable products to define their color, related size, and price at Magento store. For example, you can sell t-shirts in two colors and three sizes. The plug-in is used to define any type of attribute such as size, price, manufacturer, and color.
